basics.name: Stephen L Boettcher
basics.label: Senior Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Dynamic software development professional with over 25 years of experience across the full development lifecycle. Specializing in creating accessible and responsive web applications, I leverage deep expertise in HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript frameworks to deliver innovative, user-centric solutions. Committed to optimizing user experience while aligning with strategic business objectives, I have successfully led complex redesigns, enhanced user engagement, and implemented best practices in accessibility and performance. A proven collaborator and mentor, I thrive in cross-functional teams to drive project success and foster growth.
